Applicant : Webster, Rebecca
School (district) : Thunder Ridge High School (District 93)
Role(s) : High School Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I would like to know what type of skills that students need to have to be successful in the real world of work and to be able to teach them better skills that will help them be more successful in the world of work.
This applicant likes work environments that are:

	* Hybrid

	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.)
